title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - USMNT Coach Gregg Berhalter on Pulisic Pressure, England Smack Talk, World Cup Expectations
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - USMNT Coach Gregg Berhalter on Pulisic Pressure, England Smack Talk, World Cup Expectations
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why soon to be fired Lakers HC Frank Vogel is the least of the Lakers problems, what's behind Kareem and Magic greats teeing off on LeBron in the press, and the glaringly obvious reason why the Bears and Rams are headed in opposite directions.

Then, United States Men's Soccer Coach Gregg Berhalter and Colin discuss what he changed when he took over following the teams disastrous 2018 qualification failure (13:00), if this talented young team has a legit chance to win it all (21:00), if he's offended by the English media dismissing the USMNT as a Group B lightweight (23:00), why Weston McKinnie is such a difference maker (25:00), if this team can win in hostile road environments (28:00), what similarities this team has to the 2002 team he played on that reached the cup quarterfinal (30:00), if he's concerned about opposing teams targeting Christian Pulisic (32:00), which players are the "glue guys" (34:00), and how he'll use the pre cup friendlies to fine tune his Qatar strategy (36:00),

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
